value-tracer.description: Show changes to local variables as they happen.
value-tracer.help:
Show variable changes during execution.


value-tracer OP -- See the variable changes if OP (e.g. "next") is executed.

value-tracer-function -- Show execution history of current function with variable changes.

value-tracer-inline -- Show execution history of current function with inline annotations.

set value-tracer-inline-references -- Set whether all uses of a variable are annotated.

load-all-symbols.description: Search a directory tree for debug symbols.
load-all-symbols.help:
Locate debug symbol files for the current recording.


load-all-symbols DIRECTORY -- Recursively search DIRECTORY for relevant .debug files.


For each library loaded, UDB searches for a debug information file (.debug) with matching build ID.

load-debug-symbols.help:
Add a debug information file.


load-debug-symbols FILE -- Load debug information from FILE.

reconstruct-file.description: Reconstruct a file from writes to a file descriptor.
reconstruct-file.help:
Regenerate the content of a file that the debuggee read.


Type "help reconstruct-file" for usage information.

reverse-step-maps.description: Provides a mean to quickly get an understanding of instructions and maps used at the same time
reverse-step-maps.help:
NOTE: this addon requires the "whatmap" addon to be installed.

NOTE: x86 only.


rsm -- Identify memory maps used by the current instruction

ubt.description: Adds a ubt command which adds basic block counts to frames within a backtrace.
ubt.help: ubt -- Backtrace with basic block counts.

uregs.description: Prints the values of all the registers at every basic block within a range.
uregs.help: uregs START_TIME END_TIME -- Sample register state at every basic block.

usample.description: Sampler which counts the number of times we find ourselves in a particular function.
usample.help: usample START_TIME END_TIME STEP [FILENAME] -- Sample the function call stack.

whatmap.description: Looks up a variable or address within the maps of the debuggee.
whatmap.help:
whatmap EXPRESSION -- Locate memory map containing EXPRESSION.


Examples:

whatmap my_variable: looks up the map where my_variable is stored.

whatmap *0x1234: looks up the map containing the address 0x1234.

altui.description: Altui provides a modern and user-friendly alternative to plain UDB and to TUI mode.

info-wallclock-relative.description: info wallclock-relative command to get wallclock time relative to the start of recording.
info-wallclock-relative.help: info-wallclock-relative -- Print wallclock time offset from start of recording.

systemc-trace.description: Extract waves from a SystemC recording.

mcp-server.description: Expose Undo debug functionality as an MCP server.
